thread.title: Dena R. Glass
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Dena R. Glass

author: Dena R. Glass
title: Dena R. Glass
text: Les helped me with making the company confidential. He was so helpful and wonderful on the phone He sent me a couple of self help videos immediately after the call. It is a rare day when you get such great customer service in todays environment where it is all rush rush, even though this is totally online I felt very connected to a Human today who made my life so much easier. Thank you Les I can tell you are one in a million, they are lucky to have you, that from an HR manager that recognizes true talent. Thanks Dena Glass
